Description: On I-66 at mile marker 66 in the County of Fairfax, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 215.4 in the County of New Kent, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The east right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On US-33 in the County of Rockingham, in the vicinity of Rawley Springs Rd; Rt. 847E/W (Rockingham County), motorists can expect delays due to a brush fire. All east lanes are closed. All west lanes are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Disaster (Natural/Man-Made) - Brush Fire
